entry.title: Fake it, till you make ... or break it?
entry.summary:
Author: comeback_kid94

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,745Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 23

entry.title: Aftershock
entry.summary:
Author: MrsM

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,346Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 289

Summary: Buck never expected his past to catch up with him. After years of trying to build a new life, an unexpected new recruit threatens to unravel everything. Secrets, regrets, and unexpected connections force him to face the wreckage he thought he left behind. But sometimes, the real impact isn’t in the first quake—it’s in the aftershock.orBuck has tried to forget his time in El Paso, but he is forced to remember when the 118 gets a new probie, Eddie Diaz.

entry.title: The Boyfriend Experiment
entry.summary:
Author: aurehose

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,715Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: To get his family off his back, Eddie asks his childhood best friend, Buck, to pretend to be his boyfriend. It’s supposed to be simple—just an act. But Buck is too good at it, and Eddie starts forgetting where the lie ends and the truth begins. Between lingering touches, family gatherings, and sharing a bed, Eddie realizes he might have been in love with Buck all along. But is Buck just pretending—or has he been waiting for Eddie to figure it out? If you love fake dating, oblivious idiots, and two people falling in love while pretending they aren’t, then this is for you. Buck and Eddie are about to learn the hard way that sometimes, faking it means feeling it.

entry.title: that something lovers call fate
entry.summary:
Author: theramblingwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,703Chapters: 1/17Kudos: 1

Summary: Buck and Eddie first meet in 2016 when Eddie needs a partner to drive with him and his son from El Paso to LA where he's moving to be with his girlfriend and start a new life with the LAFD.He doesn't think he and Buck are destined to be friends. They probably won't think about each other again.Two years later Buck and Eddie run into each other when Eddie is at a cafe with his wife.Buck wonders if this is the universe giving them a second chance to get to know each other. Neither of them take it.Three more years pass by before they meet again.Eddie transfers to the 118 after his divorce, and Buck's still mourning an unexpected breakup with his girlfriend… but this time, things just seem to click.

entry.title: let's go to the beach-each
entry.summary:
Author: Faillen

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,683Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: For a while, there was just the sound of waves crashing, occasionally cut by excited laughter and chatter further down the beach. Buck watched as a small crab inched its way over the sand, catalogued the bristle of Blaze’s fur under his fingers, and pointedly did not think about why he still felt a little nauseous. There was movement at his periphery, and when Buck looked up, he found a long-haired dog sprinting up the beach, tongue lolling and tail wagging, a leash trailing in the sand behind it. Perhaps sensing Buck’s attention, or smelling Blaze, it juked hard towards them, and behind it a man—likely his owner—tripped over the sand trying to course-correct, shouting after it. “Miracle, Miracle, hey! Buddy, don’t—don’t—” Or: the author isn't even going to try to explain this one

entry.title: What is his magic good for if he can't even help his loved ones?
entry.summary:
Author: Unhingedoveractivemuse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,472Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 16

Summary: ”Your magic.”At the word, Eddie focuses on Maddie Buckley and realizes that his magic is completely erratic, searching desperately for its companion.For Buck.“I-I don’t know if I can.”Which is unusual for him. One of the first things Buck’s ever pointed out is that he naturally pulls it back. He naturally hides it. It was Buck and his magic that got him used to letting it out when there was no need to hide it, letting his magic out to practically entice Eddie’s to do so as well.And they’ve been inseparable since.But now…There’s this sense of loneliness he never knew. A loneliness that overtook him when Buck’s magic had…When it had disappeared.

entry.title: I’ll take everything (Please give me everything)
entry.summary:
Author: Cupc_kej_m24

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,252Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 12

Summary: She looks up at him as he approaches. He kneels in front of her, gently gathering the scraps of the pelt to hand back to her. She stares at him with wide eyes and scowls, shaking her head and pushing the scraps away.“Please take them. I think my abuela can fix it. But I need you to touch them first.” He begs but, her scowl only deepens. Her determination to get the scraps away from her increases though, even as he can feel her physical strength waning.He can hear the rest of the team shuffling closer, in silence as she gets visibly paler and sweatier. He knows their concern only builds when she starts to pant audibly, heaving gasps as she tries to push him away.“Isabel Diaz.”

entry.title: Reaching out to you (Lord can you save me?)
entry.summary:
Author: Webbzie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,127Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

Summary: "You can't just sit there and put everybody's lives ahead of yours and think that counts as love" - The Perks of Being a WallflowerEdmundo Diaz has been bottling up and repressing his emotions for his entire life never truly able to feel and he has finally snapped. A life changing event causes him to finally live for himself instead of carrying the burdens of others.
